Cute Patoots

By Okipoki Games

Featured: August 2025

Play or Learn More

Cute Patoots is a cheerful jaunt of colorful characters, cozy stages, and silly mysteries. See how nostalgic elements from games like Kirby and Mega Man fold into a dynamic adventure where cute meets danger.

About the Developer

Patrick Randazzo is a queer professional who works in educational product design and loves retro, experimental, and serious games.

Open Collective

Games Y'all is a meetup presented by The Museum of Human Achievement. We endeavor to celebrate, amplify, and support the unique and underrepresented within indie games and beyond.
